definitions.definition: ( historical ) A region of ancient Iran in its southwest; modern Fars province.

main_definition: ( historical ) A region of ancient Iran in its southwest; modern Fars province.

definitions.definition: An early Christian , mentioned in the epistle to the Romans.
A female given name from Ancient Greek , in occasional use since the 16th century.

main_definition: An early Christian , mentioned in the epistle to the Romans.
